description.p: It's quite simple really, a mod manager is an application to make it easier to control which mods you have installed.
You can choose to update, enable/disable or even uninstall mods with a simple click, all whilst keeping it available on another profile.

Support for Risk of Rain 2, Dyson Sphere Program, Valheim, GTFO, Outward, TaleSpire, H3VR, ROUNDS, Mechanica, Muck, BONEWORKS, Lethal League Blaze, Timberborn, Totally Accurate Battle Simulator, Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl, Inscryption, Starsand, and more.
Sort the profile list by @MythicManiac in https://github.com/ebkr/r2modmanPlus/pull/1005
save and restore editor selection on model update by @sheybey in https://github.com/ebkr/r2modmanPlus/pull/1009
Add three games AND Fix Shadows Over Loathing autodiscovery bug by @Oksamies in https://github.com/ebkr/r2modmanPlus/pull/1024
Added yml/yaml file support to the config editor by @ebkr in https://github.com/ebkr/r2modmanPlus/pull/1021
Add skul-specific bepinex package by @MythicManiac in https://github.com/ebkr/r2modmanPlus/pull/1025
Newly select data directories can be reselected at a later date by @ebkr in https://github.com/ebkr/r2modmanPlus/pull/1026
Fixed issues with MelonLoader not generating relevant assemblies by @ebkr in https://github.com/ebkr/r2modmanPlus/pull/1027
Updated README and versions by @ebkr in https://github.com/ebkr/r2modmanPlus/pull/1028
